abstract: Wells Fargo has reached a deal to buy Dallas-based Century Bancshares in an all-stock transaction. Century, which is privately held, has $1.4 billion in assets and operations in Dallas-Fort Worth, and Texarkana, Texas and Arkansas.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo has reached a deal to buy Dallas-based Century Bancshares in an all-stock transaction. Century, which is privately held, has $1.4 billion in assets and operations in Dallas-Fort Worth, and Texarkana, Texas and Arkansas.
